resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102960</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102960</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Museums and Learning: A Guide for Family Visits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Museen und Lernen: Eine Anleitung für 
Familie Besuche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musées et étude : Un guide pour des 
visites de famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Museus e aprendizagem: Uma guia para visitas
da família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musei ed imparare: Una guida per le chiamate
della famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσεία και εκμάθηση: Ένας οδηγός για τις 
οικογενειακές επισκέψεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Museos y el aprender: Una guía para las 
visitas de la familia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides basic information about museums and how they relate to learning, and suggests ways to make museum visits enjoyable learning experiences for families with children ranging in age from 4 to 12 years old.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt grundlegende Informationen über Museen und
wie sie auf dem Lernen in Verbindung stehen, zur Verfügung und 
schlägt Methoden vor, Museum Besuche erfreuliche Lernenerfahrungen 
für Familien mit den Kindern alt zu bilden, die im Alter von 4 bis 12
Jahre sich erstrecken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des informations de base au sujet des 
musées et comment elles associent à l'étude, et suggère des voies 
de rendre des visites de musée des expériences d'étude agréables 
pour des familles avec des enfants s'étendant dans l'âge à partir 
de 4 à 12 ans .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece a informação básica sobre museus e como
se relacionam à aprendizagem, e sugere maneiras fazer visitas do 
museu experiências de aprendizagem agradáveis para famílias com as 
crianças que variam na idade de 4 a 12 anos velhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le informazioni di base sui musei e come 
si riferiscono ad imparare e suggerisce i modi rendere a chiamate del 
museo le esperienze di apprendimento divertenti per le famiglie con i 
bambini che variano nell'età da 4 a 12 anni vecchie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις βασικές πληροφορίες για τα μουσεία και 
πώς αφορούν την εκμάθηση, και προτείνει τους τρόπους να γίνουν 
οι επισκέψεις μουσείων την ευχάριστη εμπειρία εκμάθησης για τις 
οικογένειες με τα παιδιά που κυμαίνονται στην ηλικία από 4 έως 
12 ετών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a la información básica sobre museos
y cómo se relacionan con aprender, y sugiere maneras de hacer las 
visitas del museo las experiencias de aprendizaje agradables para las 
familias con los niños que se extienden en edad a partir del 4 a 12 
años viejas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102960</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/museums-and-learning-a-guide-for-family-visits</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
